## WchNgLoggingModule.forRoot() method

Provides the module with default configuration

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  aConfig | <code>Ng2LoggerConfig</code> | optionally the configuration of the logger |
